Title: Ideal Heating POD HIU i405 indirect wired Mbus meter I405
Description: Designed to look like a domestic boiler, the Ideal Heating POD i405 indirect heat interface unit (HIU) effortlessly fits into a kitchen cupboard just like a boiler too. Title: Worcester Green Star  HIU E WO HM 15L PM
Description: Compatible with third party heat meters, the Worcester Greenstar 15L heat interface unit (HIU) incorporates an electronic bypass and modulating pump. An up-to-date design, this robust and reliable HIU offers a 15kW heat output and a flow rate of 15LPM, supplying comfortable and convenient domestic hot water and central heating as required.
